overview: Film adaptation from the novel by D.H. Lawrence, discovered after the celebrated author's death in 1930, a romantic love story tells of a prim young English girl who is sexually attracted to a seductively virile gypsy. The climatic dam burst is linked with the consummation of her desire.
tagline: The minister's daughter. Her father taught her about God. The gypsy taught her about Heaven.
title: The Virgin and the Gypsy
